EmailTemplate.subject: Analytics in the Cloud: Getting The Most Out Of Analytics Deployments
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Please join Pivotal's Jeff Kelly and EMA's Lyndsay Wise <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/analytics-in-the-cloud]]> to learn how cloud analytics enhances your organizationâ€™s ability to get business value out of data. This web seminar will help you understand the significance of cloud analytics adoption and provide insights into the following:
- Key drivers of analytics in cloud adoption, including business, technical, and financial - Perceptions of cloud vs on-premise solutions - Cloud success factors and business benefits - The combination of cloud access and open source - The importance of agility and workloads to create efficient analytics in cloud environments - Use cases identifying key success factors
By understanding the business and technical drivers of cloud analytic platforms and evaluating the common use cases, you can make informed decisions and gain the buy-in needed to leverage analytics in the cloud.
We look forward to you joining us. Register here <[[http://pivotal.io/big-data/webinar/analytics-in-the-cloud]]>.
The Pivotal Team
